subject: All The Way
text:
To you I say top of the day  
Since today is your birthday  
What then can I do or say  
Other than to thank Allah and pray  
That better things, come our way  Our love is like honey which does not decay  
Like mountains which the wind blows not away  
Like diamonds whose sparkle always stay  
Like antiques whose worth increases everyday  
Like rivers which flow night and day  
And refreshing like the cool breeze of the bay  When things seem to be in disarray  
My fears you always allay  
Comforting words you always say  
And you support without delay  
Rashidat, you make my day, everyday.
